Title: Centroids
Abstract:
This algorithm creates a new point layer, with points representing the centroid of the geometries in an input layer.

The attributes associated to each point in the output layer are the same ones associated to the original features.

Accepted data types.str: 'memory:' to store result in temporary memory layer
using vector provider ID prefix and destination URI, e.g. 'postgres:…' to store result in PostGIS table
